article_title: British FGM survivor hopes to end ‘abuse’
article_text: FGM survivor, Hibo Wardere, was 'cut' aged six she now hopes her new memoir will help raise awareness and stop the practice from happening to thousands of girls around the world, Emily Wither reports.
